title: How to play lol on a secondary monitor in borderless
body: i curentley have two monitors set up on my pc the main monitor is to the left and the secondary is in front of me. i would like to know if there is a way for me to play LOL in borderless mode on my secondary monitor. whenever i change the game to borderless it snaps back to my primary monitor and not the secondary monitor even if i drag the game to secondary monitor in windowed mode.

replies.body: I use my secondary monitor as my main screen, so I might be able to help!  In your Windows settings, go to screen resolution (or display) then select your monitor number (assuming #2).  You should then see a checkbox to "Make this my main display."  This will allow your borderless of full screen games to appear on that monitor from now on.  I hope that helps!
